title: New: Mmoths – Folding
content: With his Vacationer remix going down an absolute treat, Irish beatmaker prodigy Mmoths has dropped a new track in the form of the vibrant Folding. Rolling synths and handclaps throughout, it’s a marked progression from previous work, yet still centred around a pivotal hook. With Jack about to embark on a full US tour, it’s exciting times for Mmoths.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
